name: Police hot Tale
description:
Police hot Tale is a visual novel in which you will observe the romantic story of the offender and the police officer.

The game contains nudity scenes.

Gameplay includes two parts:
- visual novel where you can enjoy the story;
- arcade machine part where you can unlock the nude version of current girl.
All the girls you unlock you can see in the gallery, if you want to look at them in future.

Relaxing retrowave soundtrack by Kotovsky will make lounge experience even better!


Have fun with the hot police girl!
